attributes.action: Stop immigrants coming in the UK so Britain can be a safer place.
attributes.background:
Right I think and I knew a lot of people will agree with me when I say enough is enough Britain should say we are full and send them packing back to there original country's. 

No body cares about us Brits and what we think and want so. I have made this portion to be heard. 

WE ARE FULL!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
